posts.title: Ice Cream Sandwich Maker
posts.content: Get on the fast track to morbid obesity with the ice cream sandwich maker. No longer must you burn valuable calories getting in your car and driving to the store for some treats – instead just walk to the kitchen and munch on self-made sandwiches til you drop.

posts.title: Dog Selfie Smartphone Attachment
posts.content: Capture the perfect selfie with your pooch by outfitting your phone with the dog selfie smartphone attachment. The design takes advantage of your dog’s natural draw to a tennis ball to achieve the nearly impossible task of getting them to look directly into the camera.

posts.title: The Unbreakable Umbrella
posts.content: Protect yourself from the rain in addition to potential attacks that may come your way with the unbreakable umbrella. This unique umbrella is made with sturdy materials that enable it to keep you dry and also double as a self defense weapon.

posts.title: Sumo Wrestler Table
posts.content: Give your home a Far East feel to it with this Sumo wrestler table. This highly detailed and hand painted glass top table features a practitioner of one oldest martial arts in the world – sumo wrestling – in an iconic wide stance.

posts.title: Hands Free Baby Bottle Holder
posts.content: Make feeding time a little easier on yourself by using this hands free baby bottle holder. The ingenious design holds the bottle at just the right angle so that junior can drink comfortably while allowing you to keep your other hand free.

posts.title: Ultrasonic Beer Can Foamer
posts.content: Just because you’re drinking from a can doesn’t mean you can’t enjoy a nice frothy head on your brew. The ultrasonic beer can foamer fits over the can and utilizes ultrasonic vibrations to create a thick and creamy head of foam as you pour it into your glass.

posts.title: Portable Armrest Extender/Divider
posts.content: Create a little extra elbow room on your cramped flight by bringing the airplane portable armrest extender and divider. It clamps onto the existing armrest to provide you and your neighbor with extra room for resting your arm and folds flat for easy storage.

posts.title: Pinata Cake Pan
posts.content: Make your dentist really earn his paycheck at your yearly check-up by whipping up some pinata cakes. With the pinata cake pan, you can create unique sugar-packed treats containing a frosty exterior and an even sweeter interior everyone will love – except your dentist.

posts.title: 12 Person Inflatable Lounger
posts.content: Enjoy some quality time with your closest friends by heading out on the water with the 12 person inflatable lounger. The circular design allows everyone to comfortably face each other and features a large opening at the center for easy access.

posts.title: Rapid Beverage & Wine Chiller
posts.content: There’s no better house warming gift for the impatient alcoholic than this rapid beverage and wine chiller device. This handy electronic gadget quickly chills cans in just one minute and wine bottles in as little as six minutes!

posts.title: Moldable Plastic Pellets
posts.content: Let your imagination run wild as you craft your very own toys for a fraction of the cost using these moldable plastic pellets. Once cooled down, your plastic shapes will be rock solid – but once put back into hot water, you can melt them again to create different things!

posts.title: App Controlled Personal Robot
posts.content: The future has arrived in the form of this app controlled personal robot. Standing at 4 feet tall, this little guy features fully articulated limbs powered by 10 motors to create life-like movement you can control using your smartphone.
